alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kenedy; Coastal Willacy; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Kenedy Island; Northern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 6:25PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Kenedy, northeastern Hidalgo and Willacy Counties through 715 PM CST... At 624 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kenedy County Wind Farms to 10 miles northeast of San Manuel. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Raymondville, Lyford, Armstrong, Port Mansfield, Hargill, Lasara, San Manuel, Linn, San Perlita, and Red Gate. This includes the following highways... Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 41 and 51. US Highway 77 between mile markers 734 and 762. US Highway 281 between mile markers 752 and 762. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
